REST_ERROR.nodeAlreadyPresent: There is already a(n) {{conflictingNodeType}} with the same name at this location. Please try to create it with a different name.
REST_ERROR.noWriteAccessToFolder: You do not have permission to write to the folder.
REST_ERROR.groupAlreadyPresent:
There is already a group with the same name present in the system.
Please choose a different name.
REST_ERROR.folderPermissionsCanNotBeChanged: The permissions of the selected folder cannot be changed.
REST_ERROR.folderNotFound:
Folder not found.
Please use the UI elements to navigate to an existing folder.
REST_ERROR.noReadAccessToResource: You do not have permission to read the resource.
REST_ERROR.noWriteAccessToResource: You do not have permission to write the resource.
REST_ERROR.permissionMissing:
You do not have permission to perform this action.
Please request the {{permissionName}} permission.
REST_ERROR.createInvalidFolderName:
The folder was not created since the folder name ({{name}}) was invalid!
Please try to create it again with a different name.
REST_ERROR.updateInvalidFolderName:
The folder was not renamed since the folder name ({{name}}) was invalid!
Please try to rename it again to a different name.
REST_ERROR.publishedResourceCanNotBeChanged: The resource {{name}} can not be changed since it is published!
REST_ERROR.publishedResourceCanNotBeDeleted: The resource {{name}} can not be deleted since it is published!
REST_ERROR.groupCanBeModifiedOnlyByGroupAdmin: The group can be modified only by the administrators of the groups!
REST_ERROR.groupCanBeDeletedOnlyByGroupAdmin: The group can be deleted only by the administrators of the groups!
REST_ERROR.specialGroupCanNotBeDeleted: The special group {{name}} can not be deleted!

REST_ERROR_REASON.userHomeFolder: The selected folder is a user home folder.
REST_ERROR_REASON.systemFolder: The selected folder is a system folder.
REST_ERROR_REASON.nonEmptyFolder: The selected folder is not empty.
REST_ERROR_REASON.templateReferencedInInstances: The template is used by {{referenceCount}} instance(s).
